CustomField.formula: IF(hidden_OrgRevenue_In_Previous_Month__c != 0 && Current_Year__c, /* Green flag if Traded in Previous Month Current FY */ IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif","Traded"), IF(NOT(Current_Year__c), "NA", /* If not in Current Year = show "NA" message */ IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif","Did Not Trade"))) /* otherwise Red flag */
CustomField.label: Traded In Previous Month
